entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS We all know Trump NEEDS people to praise him. With that in mind: maybe everyone who is currently infected with Covid-19 should find Trump and give him a big, fat, wet kiss as thanks for everything he has done during this crisis. It seems only fair that he gets what he deserves.
